attributes.action: create an obligatory dog registration scheme.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The scheme would be obligatory for all dog handlers/owners to register their dogs and its identity chip, thus forcing obligatory chipping.  The scheme to be open to the public to allow people to check if a dog in their neighbourhood is registered and inform the relevant authority should it not be.  The owner of the dog be given one week to comply or have their dog taken and humanely euthanised.
